subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
Alcohol Abuse
lead_paragraph: Pat Summerall, who died Tuesday at 82, had a rare ability to broadcast many sports while using few words. He also used his experience at the Betty Ford Center to help other alcoholics.
snippet: Pat Summerall, who died Tuesday at 82, had a rare ability to broadcast many sports while using few words. He also used his experience at the Betty Ford Center to help other alcoholics.
